    public class SiftOverlay
extends CustomOverlay<SiftDescriptor>
    Custom ImageJ overlay for drawing SIFT descriptors as "M"-shaped markers.

        public void setFeatureScale​(double featureScale)

      • makeRoi

        public ij.gui.Roi makeRoi​(SiftDescriptor sd)
        Description copied from class: CustomOverlay
        This method, which must be implemented by any subclass of CustomOverlay, defines how an instance of type CustomOverlay is converted to an Roi object. Called by CustomOverlay.addItem(Object).
        Specified by:
        makeRoi in class CustomOverlay<SiftDescriptor>
        Parameters:
        sd - an instance of type CustomOverlay to be added to the overlay
        Returns:
        the resulting Roi object
